name: ndc-assessments
title: Assessments of Climate Action Plans
description: Data Package with Assessments of the Nationally Determined Contributions (NDCs)

fields.name: Date actions come into effect and date of completion
Percentage of national emissions covered, as reflected in the most recent national greenhouse gas inventory
Assumed IPCC Inventory methodologies to be used to track progress
Assumed global warming potential (GWP) values to be used to track progress
International market mechanisms: Planned use of international market mechanisms
International market mechanisms: Limit on the percentage of emission reductions that may be achieved through the use of units from international market mechanisms
International market mechanisms: Assumed types and years of units to be applied
International market mechanisms: Whether and how any units purchased/acquired or sold/transferred abroad will ensure environmental integrity and avoid double counting
Accounting for emissions and removals from the land sector: Treatment of land sector
Accounting for emissions and removals from the land sector: Coverage of the land sector as compared to total net emissions from the land sector, as a percentage if known
Accounting for emissions and removals from the land sector: Assumed accounting approach for the land sector (activity-based or land-based)
Accounting for emissions and removals from the land sector: Assumed accounting method for the land sector (net-net, forward-looking baseline, or gross-net)
Accounting for emissions and removals from the land sector: Level against which emissions and removals from the land sector are accounted, including policy assumptions and methodologies employed
Accounting for emissions and removals from the land sector: Any assumed use of methodologies to quantify and account for natural disturbances and legacy effects
Accounting for emissions and removals from the land sector: Any other relevant accounting approaches, assumptions or methodologies
Baseline scenario targets: Static or dynamic baseline scenario
Baseline scenario targets: Cut-off year for policies included in the baseline scenario, and any significant policies excluded from the baseline scenario
Baseline scenario targets: Emission drivers included and assumptions and data sources for key drivers
Baseline scenario targets: For dynamic baseline scenario targets, under what conditions will the baseline be recalculated
Assumptions and methodological approaches for GHG reduction targets relative to emissions intensity
Assumptions and methodological approaches for INDCs that include actions
Description of how it contributes towards achieving the objective of the Convention
Additional action that could be achieved if certain conditions were met
Additional information on adaptation not captured elsewhere, if relevant
Additional information, explanation, or context as relevant
